New Records: Paul George scored 30 points, ending his shooting slump, and De'Aaron Fox and Malik Monk contributed significantly to the Kings' 113-107 win with Fox scoring 35 points and Monk 20 points
Key Match Events: The Kings tied the game late in the fourth quarter after De'Aaron Fox scored a lay-up following a Sixers turnover and Tyrese Maxey had a pocket picked leading to a DeMar DeRozan lay-up that tied the game again
Post-Match Reflections: The Sixers let the game slip away due to poor execution and turnovers, while the Kings showcased resilience in avoiding a loss at home
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings avoided a loss at home, which was a significant morale boost
